description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Freely inspired by the old Gravitation of the Net Yaroze with some improvements. Learn to perfectly control your ship and challenge your friends in both making the best lap time or fast dead match. Thirty-one race map, nine dead match map, nine power up in dead match mode, in a fast simple and good looking game. Author: Silvano Mantione.
